field.name: extendDefault
field.label: Make Extendable
field.description: Extend core component class. Its better to use OOP to extend components. You will be able to extend your override classes extend a Component[Controller|Model|View][Name]Default

field.name: changePrivate
field.label: Change Functions
field.description: Changes all private methods in the base class to protected methods which allows the subclass to extend the base class better. This is not recommended unless you really need it.
